name: Aged Treasure Map
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, In-world document: Aged Treasure Map, creased parchment, water damage, ink bleed, readable serif fonts; clear headings; no gibberish, microtext / cipher hints, high-res scan, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Text must be legible and non-gibberish. Favor simple, readable serif fonts, larger kerning, and clear headings. If uncertain, use short Latin-like placeholder words with proper spacing, or leave blank lines for later typesetting., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Aged Treasure Map as an in-world paper prop.
revised_prompt: Create an image of an old, creased treasure map made from aged parchment, complete with signs of water damage and ink bleed. The display should conform to a painterly collection style demonstrating heroic tabletop fantasy similar to Dungeons and Dragons, and must contain culturally coherent medieval gear but avoid any modern technology. Font should be a legible, clear, and easy to read serif style with large kerning and distinct headings. Cipher hints or microtext can be included but should avoid gibberish and must be high-resolution. Emphasize aquatic fantasy realism in the imagery such as artificial illumination from bioluminescent accents, subsurface caustics effects, and pressure-dome materials. The color palette should focus on teals, deep blues, sea-greens with pearl highlights. Please ensure the text components adhere to the principle of legibility and meaningfulness avoiding garbled or random character strings or using numbered pins instead. The overall aspect should be devoid of artifacts, sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, and anime style elements.
